Articles.Content:
I can't find a Bug report sub forum, so I'll post this here... Chances are someone beat me to it, but hey...

My astronaut complex is at tier 2(?). I can have 12 active Kerbals. Currently, I have 11 in LKO, MÃƒÂ¼n and Minus. It is, however no problem to launch an Mk1-2 command pod with 3 Kerbals aboard. Bringing the total of active Kerbals on 14... <insert spooky music>

Bug Reports go in the Support (unmodded) Forum.

Anyways, do you have auto-hire on?

Bug Reports go in the Support (unmodded) Forum.

Anyways, do you have auto-hire on?

Probably.

But that shouldn't matter, should it?

auto-hire is when it auto hires crews.

It's a work-around for the limit to the Astronaut Complex limiter.

But this should be fixed.

Moved to Support, and on testing it here with one crew available and launching a Mk1-2, I don't get any extra Kerbals.

Can you consistently reproduce this and post steps please, and your logs
Sorry, I tried to reproduce it and failed.
